KnowledgeBase.Title: Example List compare 020
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compareEQ compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compare functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. An Integer value is returned.

Syntax.Expression: <sc> (compare '(a b c d e) '(a (b c) (d e) g )) </sc>
Syntax.Note: The first Quoted List is greater than the second List.
The first List is lesser than the second Pair.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer a Boolean resulting from the comparison , use the compareEQ, compareNE, compareGT, compareLT functions.
